arena.title: Wolf Mutts
arena.description: Wolf mutts are released into the arena

arena.title: Acid Rain
arena.description: Acid rains falls down onto the arena

arena.title: Poison Cloud
arena.description: A cloud of poisonous gas seeps fills up the arena

arena.title: Hurricane
arena.description: An enormous hurricane wrecks havoc on the arena

arena.title: Tracker Jacker Swarm
arena.description: A swarm of tracker jackers invade the arena

arena.title: Tsunami
arena.description: A giant wave washes across the arena

arena.title: Firestorm
arena.description: A fire breaks out and spreads rapidly through the arena

arena.title: Border Shrink
arena.description: The borders of the arena begin to shrink rapidly

arena.title: Monkey Mutts
arena.description: Groups of monkey mutts storm the arena

arena.title: Carnivorous Squirrels
arena.description: Carnivorous squirrels begin invading the arena

arena.title: Volcano
arena.description: A nearby volcano begins to erupt near the arena

arena.title: Total Darkness
arena.description: The arena turns pitch black and no one can see anything
